Body:
sender_wallet = Wallet()
provider_address = Wallet().address
asset_hash = 'AssetH1'
expected = (
    """{
    "senderAddress": "%s",
    "nonce": 1,
    "expirationTime": 0,
    "actionFee": 0.01,
    "actions": [
        {
            "actionType": "RemoveKycProvider",
            "actionData": {
                "assetHash": "%s",
                "providerAddress": "%s"
            }
        }
    ]
}"""
     % (sender_wallet.address, asset_hash, provider_address))
tx = Tx(sender_wallet.address, 1, 0.01, 0)
tx.add_remove_kyc_provider_address_action(asset_hash, provider_address)
actual = tx.to_json()
assert expected == actual
